title: Reinforcement Learning in Non-Markovian Environments. (arXiv:2211.01595v1 [eess.SY])
description: Following the novel paradigm developed by Van Roy and coauthors for reinforcement learning in arbitrary non-Markovian environments, we propose a related formulation inspired by classical stochastic control that reduces the problem to recursive computation of approximate sufficient statistics.
dc:creator: Siddharth Chandak, Vivek S Borkar, Parth Dodhia
